page.title: 13Recreation, Faceby (page ii)
page.content: {Gardening}is a popular leisure activity. Gardens of the newer houses are landscaped and laid out for best effect and easy maintenance, with high-powered machines for cutting large areas of lawn. There is usually a patio for relaxing and outdoor barbecues. A vegetable patch is often omitted though some residents enjoy growing and showing their own produce at local shows.{Pony riding}is very popular with the younger age-group. {Falconry and archery}are two unusual hobbies taken up by individuals. {Cricket and football}enthusiasts can join teams at Swainby, and amateur {motor-cyclists}practise in fields around Whorlton Castle.{Darts}are played at the Sutton Arms in Faceby. Most homes have a colour television set; some have a video recorder. A {mobile library}visits weekly.
